casebody.data:
PINE
v.
WAL-MART ASSOCIATES, INC. #1552, et al. 335A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 3, 2018 Ms. Holly M. Stott, Charlotte, Attorney at Law, for Wal-Mart Associates, Inc. #1552, et al Mr. M. Duane Jones, Charlotte, Attorney at Law, for Wal-Mart Associates, Inc. #1552, et al Mr. David A. Shelby, Salisbury, Attorney at Law, for Pine, Patricia Ms. Linda Stephens, Raleigh, Attorney at Law, for Wal-Mart Associates, Inc. #1552, et al Mr. Vernon Sumwalt, Charlotte, Attorney at Law, for N.C. Advocates for Justice

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th of June 2018 by Plaintiff to Substitute New Brief with Corrected Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of August 2018."
